name.desc: The name of the emoji to be renamed. Colons (:myemoji:) around the value are not required, although they may be included.

new_name.desc: The new name of the emoji.

errors.cannot_resolve_alias: The alias emoji could not be resolved
errors.error_missing_name: Value passed for `name` is missing or empty.
errors.error_name_taken_i18n: The name has already been taken by another emoji, in the international set. Emoji must have unique names.
errors.failed_to_fetch_active_team: There are no active teams on the org and we need at least one.
errors.failed_to_rename_emoji: The emoji could not be renamed.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and Admins.
